directions: Mix Sauvignon Blanc, pineapple juice, triple sec, and brandy together in a large pitcher. Add chopped pineapple, orange, lemon, and lime. Cover and refrigerate, 8 hours to overnight.
Stir in lemon-lime soda before serving.
ingredients: 2 cups lemon-lime flavored carbonated beverage (such as 7-Up®)
title: Pineapple Sangria
